bug.author: ddofer
bug.description: The <denchmark-link:https://mltooling.slack.com/join/shared_invite/zt-e4y14rbp-IReRxmjoNy27XQFQgh~4ZQ#/>link </denchmark-link> from the main README to the slack discussion appears broken ("Link is no longer active"). For now, I opened a PR via a seperate branch (improvements to the example notebooks). Hopefully that's ok!

comments.comment: Yeah right, I think the link expired, we'll need to change it in the README, but in the meantime you can access the slack using this <denchmark-link:https://join.slack.com/t/mltooling/shared_invite/zt-fxaj0qk7-SWy2_~EWyhj4x9SD6gbRvg>https://join.slack.com/t/mltooling/shared_invite/zt-fxaj0qk7-SWy2_~EWyhj4x9SD6gbRvg</denchmark-link> let me know it that does not work either
